name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Basketball
overview: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Basketball is another TMNT LCD game courtesy of Konami, however this time the titular turtles have ditched their weapons and are playing a game of basketball against Shredder and his lackeys. In the game, the player plays 4 2 minutes rounds, each with a different turtle, and tries to score as many points as possible within that time. The player uses the circle shaped d-pad to move around the court and the right button to shoot or slam dunk the ball.
